modName: Hybrid Race - Evolution Werewolf X Vampire
summary: This is a new race with special gene that has 2 different power vampire and werewolf  but when the time comes you need to decide what you are  ! ! !
descriptionHtml:
Ok , this is my first time making a new race so if there\'s a little problem please forgive me and always backup your file :)   .

I can make this mod because a lot generous modder that lend their work and I hope my work don\'t disappointed them .
 
I\'m making an ordinary race that has a special gene ( vampire and werewolf ) but when the time comes you must pick your choice either werewolf or vampire . Because of that I already make 2 different transformation for werewolf and vampire faction .

This Race name is Hybrid 

Status
=======
 
One handed : 5
Sneak : 5
Illusion : 5
Light Armor : 5
Alteration : 5
Destruction : 5
Enchanting : 5


Ability 
=======

- Resist Damage 10
- Resist Magic 10
- Regenerate Health and Stamina much faster
- Unarmed attack more powerful 
- Power : Limit 

And I put new stuff ( just armor nightangle for style but I already lower the rating and katana  ) in the black chess in helgen .


 
Description
===========
 If you choose to join werewolf and drink the beast blood ( must for my transformation werewolf faction ) , I\'ll give you the new transformation \" The Half Hybrid Evolution \" .




* The Half Hybrid Evo 
=====================

You only have your fist :) , but  :

 - No hostile NPC when Transform  
 - You regenerate health and stamina much faster
 - Your speed more than ordinary human 
 - Unarmed attack much powerful 
 - Has ice cloak 
 - When sneaking you invisible 
 - Has 3 voice power ( But you need word Fus , Ro , wuld to unlock it ) 

     # Voice power Lv 1 . Bound Astral Armor 

      # Voice power Lv 2 . Werewolf King Transformation ( Transformation Again :) )

       # Voice power Lv 3 . Revert Back to human form 
   
 ~ Astral Armor : Has effect faster health and stamina regeneration and resist damage 

 #  Super Lycan : Werewolf King ( Male ) and Werewolf Princess ( Female )

   - This is final transformation for Half Hybrid  ( I always thinking why only Vampire has a new transformation ( Vampire Lord ) and how about werewolf ??? they still the same boring ) that\'s why I\'m making a new transformation for Werewolf King .



                                                *   Werewolf King  *
                                                   ===============


- More powerful then ordinary werewolf 
- Can regenerate health
- Much faster regenerate Stamina
- More faster then other beast
- This transformation last for a few minutes ( I don\'t make permanent so you can\'t spam it )
- His claw infuse with dark cursed that sap your opponent health
- Power attack left or right claw now will make your opponent going berserk 
- Has 3 new voice power :

  * Voice Power Lv 1 .Dark Flare ( Dark Flare infuse with fire and gravitational blast )   

    * Voice Power Lv 2 . Royal Guard ( Summon 3 Astral Werewolf )

      * Voice Power Lv 3 . Sky Roar ( Make a dragon to kneel before the mighty 
                                                   King Werewolf )    
 
Note : The spell is in the Werewolf chess ( Underforge Whiterun ) near where you drink Beast Blood .



 Description
=============

If you choose to become vampire then I present you a new Transformation \" Super Vampire \"



* Super Vampire 
================


 - Npc will not hostile  
 - You regenerate health and stamina much faster
 - Your speed more than ordinary human 
 - Unarmed attack much powerful 
 - You can float but you can\'t cast any spell ( because you a  fighter  type but I put something    exchange the lack of that )
 - Has a new Frost Cloak 
 - Your right claw attack will infuse poison
 - Your left claw attack will infuse drain health 
 - Your right power attack will send your opponent flying 
 - Your left power attack can raise dead 
 - This transformation will last for a few minutes 
 - You have Special Power but only 1 time you can use it ( The power to summon and control Vampire Lord ) 
         ~ Summoned Vampire Lord can only attack with magic ( float ) and no unarmed attack .
         ~ Summoned Vampire Lord in his left hand conjure Gargoyle and cast Shock Cloak .
         ~ Summoned Vampire Lord in his hand cast Drain Health attack .
         ~ Summoned Vampire last for 120 second ( so you can\'t spam it ) .
         ~ Summoned Vampire will make everyone hostile    :)  .
 
Note : you can find the spell in vampire chess ( Volkihar Castle / Keep  near Alchemy Lab )


Recommended 
==============

- Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement
- ApachiiSkyHair
- New textures for human and elven men
- Better Female
- UNP
- Elewin Real Sunglasses
- Nightingale Prime HD


Bug 
=====

When you cast spell for super vampire , I hope you don\'t equip crossbow / bow and ammo . You can equip other weapon except bow and crossbow . I still can\'t fix it for now , sorry about this .


I think that\'s it for now .



CREDITS AND THANKS 
=====================

  - Loshirai14 ( The original Werewolf King Armor )

  - MadCat221 ( The original Werewolf Princess )

  - AmethystDeceiver ( The original Psychokinesis Spell )

  - foster xbl ( True Bound Armors )         

  - Jackalhead for the guide about Polymorph Transformation Spell   

  - Bethesda for Skyrim and CK

  - Skyrim Nexus
author: MingPaulus
